content.prompt: Which of the following statements is best supported by the data shown in the graph?

choices.label: PV panels that cannot track the Sun and are in a fixed position tilted to the east produce the most electricity daily and annually.
Of the PV panels that cannot track the Sun, those in a fixed position tilted to the west produce more electricity daily and annually than do those in a fixed position tilted to the south.
PV panels that cannot track the Sun and are in a fixed position tilted to the south produce the least electricity daily and annually.
PV panels that can track the Sun and are constantly moving to always directly face the Sun produce the most electricity daily and annually.

skill.text: Skill 5.C: Explain patterns and trends in data to draw conclusions.
